page.title: 10Abberton Reservoir
page.content: {Abberton Reservoir}is located South of Colchester on the B1026 road. It is one of the biggest reservoirs in Essex, covering about 1200 acres. It was built 57 years ago in 1928 to store water for domestic use. There is a big white pumping station on the North side of the reservoir. The reservoir is divided into three sections by two cause ways which make one large area that has man made concrete sides and two smaller areas that have natural sides. It is owned by the{South Essex Waterworks Company. Besides managing the actual reservoir in 1970 the company developed an area of land by the side of it into a nature reserve. People can now visit the reserve and come to look at the wide variety and large numbers of birds that live there, or pass through.
